entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. A few wet flurries inland early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
